    Reference

    All functions

    aggregate_features()

    Aggregate rare features hierarchically with False Split Rate control

    aggregate_observations()

    Aggregate observations hierarchically with False Split Rate control

    calculate_fsp()

    Calculate False Split Proportion (FSP)

    calculate_power()

    Calculate Power

    dend_as_hclist()

    Transform a dendrogram into a list object

    find_leaves_in_list()

    Find the leaves under a node

    hclist_as_dend()

    Transform a hc_list object into a dendrogram

    hierarchical_test()

    Test on a given tree to achieve aggregation of leaves

    plot_aggregation()

    Visualize Aggregation on the Tree

    plot_tree()

    Visualize the Tree Structure

    stocks_tree

    Hierarchical tree based on NAICS for companies in the stocks dataset

    stocks_volatility

    Stocks volatility

    taxi_tree

    Hierarchical tree based on neighborhoods in NYC
